rukus.text: sillo naneun noaleul geuui salamdeul-ege bonaessnola : “geudaeui salamdeul-ege gotongseuleoun beol-i chaj-aogi jeon-e geudaeneun geudeul-ege gyeong-gohala”
geuga malhagil “naui salamdeul-iyeo. sillo naneun geudaedeul-eul wihan myeongbaeghan gyeong-gojala”
“geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul gyeongbaehago geubun-eul gyeong-oehamyeo naleul ttaleula”

“geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-eul wihae geudaedeul-ui joeleul yongseohayeo jusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul jijeongdoen gihankkaji neujchueo jusil geos-ila. geudaedeul-i andamyeon sillo hananim-ui gihan, geugeos-i dolaehaess-eul ttaeneun neujchueojiji anhnola”
geuga malhagil “jeoui junim, sillo jeoneun jeoui salamdeul-eul bamnaj-eulo bulleossseubnida”
“geuleona jeoui buleum-eun ojig geudeul-ui hoepiman-eul jeung-gasikyeoss-eul ppun-ibnida”

“dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul yongseohae jusigi wihae jega geudeul-eul buleul ttaemada geudeul-eun songalag-eul gwie daego jasin-ui os-eulo mom-eul deop-eo ssamyeo gyesoghaeseo geoman-eul tteol-eossseubnida”
“geu hu sillo jeoneun geudeul-eul solinaeeo bulleossseubnida”
“geu hu sillo jeoneun geudeul-ege gongpyohagido hago, bimilseule sogongeolimyeo geudeul-ege malhagido hayeossseubnida”
“geulihayeo jega malhayeossseubnida : ‘geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul junim-ege yongseoleul guhala. sillo geubunkkeseoneun gajang neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-idoda' ”
‘geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul wilo julgichan bileul bonaejusil geos-ila’
‘geuligo geudaedeul-ege jaesangwa jason-eul neullyeojusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae jeong-won-eul dusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae gang-eul dusil geos-ila’
‘geudaedeul-eun hananim-ui wieom-eul gaeuichi anh-euni i eojjidoen il-inga?’
‘sillo geubunkkeseoneun jeomjinjeog-eulo geudaedeul-eul changjohasyeossnola’
‘hananimkkeseo eotteohge ilgob gaeui haneul-eul cheungcheung-i changjohasyeossneunji geudaedeul-eun alji moshaneunga?’
‘geubunkkeseoneun dal-eul geu(haneul) an-e bich-eulo dusyeoss-eumyeo taeyang-eul deungbullo dusyeossnola’
‘hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul heulg-eulobuteo jalanage hasyeossnola’
‘geu hu geubunkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul geugos(heulg)eulo dol-agage hasigo geudaedeul-eul kkeonaesil geos-ila’
‘hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul wihae daejileul yungdan-eulo dusyeossnola’
‘geudaedeul-i geu an-eseo neolb-eun gil-eul deunadeul su issdolog ham-ila’
